properties.entry: SELECT O.ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , REL_DATE , RECEIPTE_DATE , ADDRESS , PHONE , PAYMENT , DELIVERY , DELIVERY_NUMBER , USER_NO , ORDERCHANGE , COUNT(BOOK_ID) FROM "ORDER" O JOIN ORDER_DETAIL D ON(O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? GROUP BY O.ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , REL_DATE , RECEIPTE_DATE , ADDRESS , PHONE , PAYMENT , DELIVERY , DELIVERY_NUMBER , USER_NO , ORDERCHANGE
